title: SMC_TRAFO_Scara2 (FunctionBlock)
text:
FUNCTION_BLOCK SMC_TRAFO_Scara2
The transformation module is provided to
execute backward transformations of 2-jointed Scara systems.
Note
For detailed information on transformation modules see
see the overview on kinematic transformations in the
CNC online help.

rows.Name: pi
rows.Comment: Target position vector (x,y). Output of Interpolator

rows: Additional offset for A-axis in degree
Additional offset for B-axis in degree
TRUEif elbow is low andFALSE, if elbow is high
Drive position of axis A in degree
Drive position of axis B in degree
